timeline.message: AdminManager class added. Replaced LogModifier with AdminManager

timeline.bodyText: request.getParam(LOGGING_PARAM) could be extracted to a local variable as it is used down below once again
timeline.author: schernysh
schernysh

timeline.bodyText: What happens if time parameter could not be parsed as Long?
timeline.author: schernysh
schernysh

timeline.bodyText: It's considered a bad practice to catch NPE. Instead of this please check for null wherever it is possible to get one.
timeline.author: schernysh

timeline.bodyText:
I'm concerned about the logic of this method.
What are you trying to achieve here and what is the actual requirement?
timeline.author: schernysh

timeline.bodyText: The method name is too generic, please pick a more telling name.
timeline.author: schernysh
schernysh

timeline.bodyText: Please consider using java.time.Instant instead of java.util.Date throughout this class.
timeline.author: schernysh

timeline.bodyText:
Actually time could be Instant as well. This will give an opportunity to use nice isBefore or isAfter methods. Also take note of plus method for getting another instant.
Another field for improvement: instead of Instance.now() use Instance.now(Clock) - this will ease testing a lot and will allow to get rid of Thread.sleep() (not 100% sure about that though :)).
timeline.author: schernysh

timeline.message: null account logging partly moved to AuctionRequestFactory

timeline.bodyText: I would extract defaultLogModifier(logger) to avoid unnecessary method execution.
timeline.author: DGarbar
